Properties.ProtectedString:
--------------------------------------------------- -- Tool Variables -- --------------------------------------------------- local Tool = script.Parent local Handle = Tool:WaitForChild('Handle') local ServerScript = Tool:WaitForChild('StPunkScript') local AbilityRemoteEvent = ServerScript:WaitForChild('AbilityRemoteEvent') local EquipAnim = Tool:WaitForChild('EquipAnim') local AnimValue = Tool:WaitForChild('Anim') local StPunkGui = Tool:WaitForChild('StPunkGui')
-- Animations local SwingAnims = { [1] = Tool:WaitForChild('OverheadSwingAnim'), [2] = Tool:WaitForChild('SlashAnim') } local CastAnim = Tool:WaitForChild('CastAnim')
--Sounds local EquipSound = Handle:WaitForChild('EquipSound')
--------------------------------------------------- -- Constants -- --------------------------------------------------- local SWING_DEBOUNCE = 0.9 local SWING_SPEED = 1.5
--------------------------------------------------- -- Effects -- --------------------------------------------------- local function createSteamEffect(parent) local smoke = Instance.new('Smoke') smoke.RiseVelocity = 10 smoke.Size = 2 smoke.Parent = parent Delay(1, function() smoke:Destroy() smoke.Parent = nil end) end
--------------------------------------------------- -- Events -- --------------------------------------------------- local function onAnimChanged(val) if val == '' then return end
local anim = nil if Tool.Parent then local character = Tool.Parent local humanoid = character:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') if humanoid and humanoid.Health > 0 then if val == 'SwingAnim' then anim = humanoid:LoadAnimation(SwingAnims[math.random(1, #SwingAnims)]) if anim then anim:Play() end elseif val == 'CastAnim' then anim = humanoid:LoadAnimation(CastAnim) if anim then anim:Play(nil, nil, 4) end end end AnimValue.Value = '' end end
AnimValue.Changed:connect(onAnimChanged)
local function onKeyDown(key) local lkey = string.lower(key)
if lkey == 'q' then AbilityRemoteEvent:FireServer(lkey) elseif lkey == 'e' then AbilityRemoteEvent:FireServer(lkey) end end
local function onMouse1Down() if Tool.Enabled then Tool.Enabled = false createSteamEffect(Handle) wait(SWING_DEBOUNCE) Tool.Enabled = true end end
local function onEquipped(mouse) if mouse then mouse.KeyDown:connect(onKeyDown) mouse.Button1Down:connect(onMouse1Down)
local player = game.Players.LocalPlayer if player then local playerGui = player:FindFirstChild('PlayerGui') if playerGui then StPunkGui.Parent = playerGui end end
if Tool.Parent then local character = Tool.Parent local humanoid = character:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') if humanoid then local equipAnim = humanoid:LoadAnimation(EquipAnim) if equipAnim then EquipSound:Play() equipAnim:Play(nil, nil, 1.5) createSteamEffect(Handle) end end end end end
local function onUnequipped() Tool.Enabled = true StPunkGui.Parent = Tool end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)

local Tool = script.Parent local Handle = Tool:WaitForChild('Handle') local AbilityRemoteEvent = script:WaitForChild('AbilityRemoteEvent') local GyserEffectScript = Tool:WaitForChild('GyserEffect') local StunScript = script:WaitForChild('StunScript') local ThisCharacter = nil local AnimValue = Tool:WaitForChild('Anim') local IsAbilityInUse = false local IsGyserInUse = false local CanHit = false -- only let sword hit if player used it local PlayersService = game:GetService('Players') local DebrisService = game:GetService('Debris')
-- Debounce Variables local IsHitDebounce = false
-- Sounds local SlashSound = Handle:WaitForChild('SlashSound') local ChargeSound = Handle:WaitForChild('ChargeSound')
--------------------------------------------------- -- Constants -- --------------------------------------------------- -- General local SWORD_DMG = 40 local SWING_SPEED = 1.5 local SWING_DEBOUNCE = 0.9 -- Steam Gyser local GYSER_NUM = 4 local GYSER_DISTANCE_THRESHOLD = 30 local GYSER_EFFECT_LEN = 5 -- Mist Charge local CHARGE_TIME = 0.5 local CAHRGE_MIN_SPEED = 50 local MIST_CHARGE_THRESHOLD = 50 local CHARGE_STUN_DMG = 15
--------------------------------------------------- -- Helper Functions -- --------------------------------------------------- local function clamp(val, low, high) if val < low then val = low elseif val > high then val = high end return val end
local function CreateStunnedGui(player, character) if not player or not character or not character:FindFirstChild('Head') then return end
local bg = Instance.new("BillboardGui") bg.Parent = character.Head bg.Adornee = character.Head -- Same size as Head bg.Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 1, 0) -- Above (defaults to inside) bg.StudsOffset = Vector3.new(0, 2.5, 0)
local frame = Instance.new("Frame") frame.Parent = bg frame.Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 1, 0) frame.BackgroundTransparency = 1 frame.BackgroundColor3 = Color3.new(1, 1, 1)
local text = Instance.new("TextLabel") text.Parent = frame text.Position = UDim2.new(0.25, 0, 0.25, 0) text.Size = UDim2.new(0.5, 0, 0.5, 0) text.TextColor3 = Color3.new(1, 39/255, 20/255) text.TextStrokeColor3 = Color3.new(1, 225/255, 73/255) text.TextStrokeTransparency = 0 text.BackgroundTransparency = 1 text.Text = "Stunned!" text.FontSize = Enum.FontSize.Size18 DebrisService:AddItem(bg, 0.75) end
--------------------------------------------------- -- Hit Events -- --------------------------------------------------- local function onSwordHit(hit) if IsHitDebounce or not CanHit then return end IsHitDebounce = true if hit.Parent then local hitCharacter = hit.Parent if hitCharacter == ThisCharacter then return end local hitHumanoid = hitCharacter:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') if hitHumanoid then local isStunned = hitCharacter:FindFirstChild('StunScript') local dmg = SWORD_DMG if isStunned then dmg = dmg + CHARGE_STUN_DMG end print(dmg) hitHumanoid:TakeDamage(dmg) wait(SWING_DEBOUNCE) end end IsHitDebounce = false end
Handle.Touched:connect(onSwordHit)
--------------------------------------------------- -- Helper Functions -- --------------------------------------------------- local function getClosestCharacters(originPosition, thisCharacter) local gyseredCharacters = {} for _,player in pairs(PlayersService:GetChildren()) do local character = player.Character local torso = character:FindFirstChild('Torso') local humanoid = character:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') if torso and humanoid and humanoid.Health > 0 and character ~= thisCharacter then if (torso.Position - originPosition).magnitude <= GYSER_DISTANCE_THRESHOLD then table.insert(gyseredCharacters, character) end end if #gyseredCharacters >= GYSER_NUM then break end end
return gyseredCharacters end
local function getClosestCharacter(originPosition, thisCharacter) local closestDistance = math.huge local closestCharacter = nil for _,player in pairs(PlayersService:GetChildren()) do local character = player.Character local torso = character:FindFirstChild('Torso') local humanoid = character:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') if torso and humanoid and humanoid.Health > 0 and character ~= thisCharacter then local distance = (torso.Position - originPosition).magnitude if distance <= MIST_CHARGE_THRESHOLD and distance < closestDistance then closestDistance = distance closestCharacter = character end end end
return closestCharacter, closestDistance end
-- Returns all objects under instance with Transparency local function GetTransparentsRecursive(instance, partsTable) local partsTable = partsTable or {} for _, child in pairs(instance:GetChildren()) do if child:IsA('BasePart') or child:IsA('Decal') then if child.Name ~= 'HumanoidRootPart' then table.insert(partsTable, child) end end GetTransparentsRecursive(child, partsTable) end return partsTable end
--------------------------------------------------- -- Abilities -- --------------------------------------------------- -- Steam Gyser local function doGyserEffect(characters) if #characters < 1 then return end IsGyserInUse = true for _,character in pairs(characters) do -- add script to player if not character:FindFirstChild('GyserEffect') then local gyserScript = GyserEffectScript:Clone() gyserScript.Disabled = false gyserScript.Parent = character end end end
local function steamGyser(character) if IsGyserInUse then return end IsAbilityInUse = true Delay(GYSER_EFFECT_LEN + 1, function() IsGyserInUse = false end) local torso = character:FindFirstChild('Torso') local humanoid = character:FindFirstChild('Humanoid')
if humanoid and humanoid.Health > 0 and torso then AnimValue.Value = 'CastAnim' doGyserEffect(getClosestCharacters(torso.Position, character)) end IsAbilityInUse = false end
-- Mist Charge local function doMistCharge(targetCharacter, character, start, distance) local target = targetCharacter:FindFirstChild('Torso') if target then local transparentParts = GetTransparentsRecursive(character) local mist = nil if #transparentParts > 0 then mist = Instance.new('Smoke') mist.RiseVelocity = 20 mist.Size = 5 mist.Parent = start
for _,part in pairs(transparentParts) do part.Transparency = 1 end end
wait()
local speed = clamp(distance / CHARGE_TIME, CAHRGE_MIN_SPEED, 1000000) local direction = (target.Position - start.Position).unit local bodyVelocity = Instance.new('BodyVelocity') bodyVelocity.velocity = direction * speed bodyVelocity.P = 4000 bodyVelocity.maxForce = Vector3.new(1000000, 1000000, 1000000) bodyVelocity.Parent = start DebrisService:AddItem(bodyVelocity, CHARGE_TIME + 0.2) start.CFrame = CFrame.new(start.CFrame.p, start.CFrame.p + bodyVelocity.velocity) local bodyGyro = Instance.new('BodyGyro') bodyGyro.Parent = start DebrisService:AddItem(bodyGyro, 0.3)
-- fail safe in case they don't hit a player with charge local connection = nil Delay(CHARGE_TIME + 0.2, function() if bodyVelocity then bodyVelocity.velocity = Vector3.new() bodyVelocity:Destroy() bodyVelocity.Parent = nil end if connection then connection:disconnect() end if #transparentParts > 0 then for _,part in pairs(transparentParts) do part.Transparency = 0 end end if mist then mist:Destroy() mist.Parent = nil end end)
local hasHitWithCharge = false connection = start.Touched:connect(function(hit) if hasHitWithCharge then return end if hit.Parent and hit.Parent ~= character then local hitCharacter = hit.Parent local hitHumanoid = hitCharacter:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') if hitHumanoid and hitHumanoid.Health > 0 and hitCharacter == targetCharacter then hasHitWithCharge = true bodyVelocity.velocity = Vector3.new() bodyVelocity:Destroy() bodyVelocity.Parent = nil if #transparentParts > 0 then for _,part in pairs(transparentParts) do part.Transparency = 0 end end if mist then mist:Destroy() mist.Parent = nil end CreateStunnedGui(PlayersService:GetPlayerFromCharacter(hitCharacter), hitCharacter) CreateStunnedGui(PlayersService:GetPlayerFromCharacter(ThisCharacter), hitCharacter) if not hitCharacter:FindFirstChild('StunScript') then local stun = StunScript:Clone() stun.Disabled = false stun.Parent = hitCharacter end end end end) end end
local function mistCharge(character) IsAbilityInUse = true Delay(CHARGE_TIME, function() IsAbilityInUse = false end) local torso = character:FindFirstChild('Torso') local humanoid = character:FindFirstChild('Humanoid')
if humanoid and humanoid.Health > 0 and torso then local closestCharacter, distance = getClosestCharacter(torso.Position, character) if closestCharacter then ChargeSound:Play() doMistCharge(closestCharacter, character, torso, distance) end end end
--------------------------------------------------- -- Remote Events -- --------------------------------------------------- local function onServerEvent(player, key) if IsAbilityInUse then return end if player then character = player.Character if character then local humanoid = character:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') if humanoid and humanoid.Health > 0 then if key == 'q' then steamGyser(character) elseif key == 'e' then mistCharge(character) end end end end end
AbilityRemoteEvent.OnServerEvent:connect(onServerEvent)
--------------------------------------------------- -- Events -- --------------------------------------------------- local function onActivated() if CanHit or IsAbilityInUse then return end CanHit = true SlashSound:Play() AnimValue.Value = 'SwingAnim' wait(SWING_DEBOUNCE) CanHit = false end
local function onEquipped() ThisCharacter = Tool.Parent end
local function onUnequipped() IsAbilityInUse = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)

local MyCharacter = script.Parent local Humanoid = MyCharacter:FindFirstChild('Humanoid')
if MyCharacter and Humanoid then local origSpeed = Humanoid.WalkSpeed Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 0 wait(0.75) Humanoid.WalkSpeed = origSpeed end
script:Destroy() script.Parent = nil

--------------------------------------------------- -- This script is being added to the characer -- --------------------------------------------------- local character = script.Parent local torso = character:FindFirstChild('Torso') local DebrisService = game:GetService('Debris') local GyserSound = script:WaitForChild('GyserSound')
--------------------------------------------------- -- Constants -- --------------------------------------------------- local GYSER_EFFECT_LEN = 5 local VELOCITY = Vector3.new(0, 50, 0) local GYSER_DMG_PER_TICK = 10
--------------------------------------------------- -- Helper Functions -- --------------------------------------------------- -- Ping pongs between 0 and length local function pingPong(t, length) local l = 2 * length local s = t % l
local result = l - s
if result < length then return result else return l - result end end
local function createSteamEffect(position) local part = Instance.new('Part') part.Transparency = 1 part.Anchored = true part.CanCollide = false part.CFrame = CFrame.new(position)
local smoke = Instance.new('Smoke') smoke.RiseVelocity = 10 smoke.Size = 10 smoke.Opacity = 1 smoke.Parent = part
part.Parent = game.Workspace DebrisService:AddItem(part, GYSER_EFFECT_LEN) end
--------------------------------------------------- -- Effect -- --------------------------------------------------- if torso then local bodyVelocity = Instance.new('BodyVelocity') bodyVelocity.velocity = Vector3.new(0, 20, 0) bodyVelocity.P = 4000 bodyVelocity.maxForce = Vector3.new(1000000, 1000000, 1000000) bodyVelocity.Parent = torso GyserSound.Parent = torso GyserSound:Play()
createSteamEffect(torso.Position - Vector3.new(0, 3, 0)) wait(0.4)
local dmgTick = 1 local humanoid = character:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') local t = 0 local deltaTime = tick() while t < GYSER_EFFECT_LEN do local yScalar = pingPong(deltaTime * 3, 1) - 0.5 -- range from -0.5 to 0.5 bodyVelocity.velocity = VELOCITY * yScalar t = t + (tick() - deltaTime) deltaTime = tick() wait() if humanoid then if humanoid.Health < 1 then break elseif t > dmgTick then humanoid:TakeDamage(GYSER_DMG_PER_TICK) dmgTick = dmgTick + 1 end end end
GyserSound:Stop() GyserSound.Parent = script bodyVelocity.velocity = Vector3.new() bodyVelocity:Destroy() bodyVelocity.Parent = nil
script:Destroy() script.Parent = nil end

Properties.string: Use Q or E for special abilities!
